bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Mechanical Core Specifications for Microcomputers Using IEC 603-2 Connectors
IEEE Standard for Mechanical Core Specifications for Microcomputers Using IEC 603-2 Connectors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Superseded by 1101.1-1998 (SH/SS94691) The basic dimensions of a range of modular subracks conforming to IEC 60297-3 (1984-01) and IEC 60297-4 (1995-03) for mounting in equipment according to IEC 60297-1 (1986-09) andANSI/EIA 310-D-1992, together with the basic dimensions of a compatible range of plug-in units,printed boards, and backplanes, are covered. The dimensions and tolerances necessary to ensuremechanical function compatibility are provided. This standard offers total system integration guide-lines with attendant advantages, such as reduction in design and development time, manufacturingcost savings, and distinct marketing advantages.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
